description: Expansion of layer susceptibility series for square lattice.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
S. G. Whittington, G. M. Torrie and A. J. Guttmann, The Ising model with a free surface: a series analysis study, J. Phys. A 12 (1979), 2449-2455.
author: _Simon Plouffe_
